net.antidot.paf

Class ProcessorFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.antidot.paf.Filter
      • net.antidot.paf.ProcessorFilter

  • public abstract class ProcessorFilter
extends Filter
    This class is pre-defined specialization of Filter which help to define processor filter. The init() method is optional and does nothing by default. The generate() does nothing and cannot be overriden. The work() method is responsible to call the process(Document) for each received document and to re-send them to the scheduler. This method cannot be overriden.
    Version:
    7.4
    Author:
    Laurent Mazuel

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
          throws Exception
        Description copied from class: Filter
        The init method, which will be called one time at the beginning of the filter. At this step, the Scheduler will be not ready to give document to filters whith the Handle.receive() method. The main purpose of this method if to initialize the filter. Then, it is the best place to use the inherited Filter.configuration instance to set the correct state of the filter.
        Specified by:
        init in class Filter
        Throws:
        Exception - Allows developers to rise Exception instance

      • generate

        public final void generate()
        Description copied from class: Filter
        The filter method, which can be used to generate documents. The PaF will only exist if all the generate methods of all filters have existed their Filter.generate() method. Be careful of blocking this method.
        Specified by:
        generate in class Filter

      • work

        public final int work()
               throws Exception
        Description copied from class: Filter
        The work method during the PaF life.
        Specified by:
        work in class Filter
        Returns:
        the return code of the application.
        Throws:
        Exception - Allows developers to rise Exception instance

      • process

        public abstract void process(Document doc)
                      throws Exception
        The process method called for each document. You don't have to send manually this document which will be automatically sended to the next filter when the process method ends. If you want to send the document to another filter for the successor, you have to inherit directly Filter.
        Parameters:
        doc - A document to process.
        Throws:
        Exception
